uk.ac.glasgow.internman

Interface Internship

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InternshipImpl

    public interface Internship
    Internships are central to the system. These can be associated with students once they've applied, and received, an internship obtained eitiher through the system or self-sourced.
    Author:
    TeamW

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Internship.InternshipStatus
      An internship can have many statuses: 1.

    • Method Detail

      • getManager

        java.lang.String getManager()
        Internships have a job manager
        Returns:
        String representing manger name

      • getManagerEmail

        java.lang.String getManagerEmail()
        Internships have a job manager
        Returns:
        String representing manger emal

      • isVisitComplete

        boolean isVisitComplete()
        Internship performance is graded by a visitor. This method returns whether or not a visit has been completed.
        Returns:
        Boolean true if visit completed, otherwise false.

      • getEmployer

        Employer getEmployer()
        Internships were submitted by an employer, this returns that employer.
        Returns:
        Employer object of the employer who submitted the advertisement.

      • getRole

        Role getRole()
        Internships have a one-to-one relationship with an associated role. This method returns that role.
        Returns:
        Role associated with this internship.

      • setRole

        void setRole(Role temp)
        Internships have a one-to-one relationship with an associated role. This method returns that role.
        Parameters:
        temp - Role associated with this internship.

      • getStatus

        Internship.InternshipStatus getStatus()
        An internship can have many statuses: 1. Pending approval 2. Withdrawn 3. Accepted by student 4. Approved by course coordinator
        Returns:
        Internship status

      • getVisit

        Visit getVisit()
        Each internship has a visit associatedw ith it where the student's performance is graded.
        Returns:
        Visit object if visit completed, null otherwise.

      • approve

        void approve()
        A course coordinator needs to approve an internship accepted by a student. This method accepts it.

      • setVisit

        void setVisit(Visit v)
        Once a visit has been completed. The information recorded has to be stored with the internship
        Parameters:
        v - Visit object with information in regards to the student's performance.

      • accept

        void accept()
        A student needs to accept an internship. The internship is then sent to the course coordinator for approval.
